name: CAReplicatorLayer
desc: A layer that creates a specified number of sublayer copies with varying geometric, temporal, and color transformations.

items.name: var instanceCount: Int
items.desc: The number of copies to create, including the source layers.

items.name: var instanceDelay: CFTimeInterval
items.desc: Specifies the delay, in seconds, between replicated copies. Animatable.

items.name: var instanceTransform: CATransform3D
items.desc: The transform matrix applied to the previous instance to produce the current instance. Animatable.

items.name: var preservesDepth: Bool
items.desc: Defines whether this layer flattens its sublayers into its plane.

items.name: var instanceColor: CGColor?
items.desc: Defines the color used to multiply the source object. Animatable.

items.name: var instanceRedOffset: Float
items.desc: Defines the offset added to the red component of the color for each replicated instance. Animatable.

items.name: var instanceGreenOffset: Float
items.desc: Defines the offset added to the green component of the color for each replicated instance. Animatable.

items.name: var instanceBlueOffset: Float
items.desc: Defines the offset added to the blue component of the color for each replicated instance. Animatable.

items.name: var instanceAlphaOffset: Float
items.desc: Defines the offset added to the alpha component of the color for each replicated instance. Animatable.
